fireclient.module.auto_message.name: Auto Message

fireclient.module.block_outline.name: Block Outline

fireclient.module.coordinates.descriptio: Shows your in game coordinates, coordinates for the other dimension, and supports a separate window

fireclient.module.coordinates.windowed_m: Shows a separate window for coordinates. Useful for streaming/screenshares
fireclient.module.coords_chat.name: Coords Chat
fireclient.module.coords_chat.descriptio: Sends your coordinates to everybody online (blank) or the selected players when pressing the keybind. (names split by space  , comma , , or pipe | )
fireclient.module.death_info.name: Death Info
fireclient.module.death_info.description: Shows your death location in the screen and in chat

fireclient.module.elytra_swap.descriptio: Swaps your elytra and chestplate when pressing the keybind

fireclient.module.flight_speed.descripti: Allows the control of flight speed

fireclient.module.fullbright.name: Fullbright
fireclient.module.health_display.name: Health Display
fireclient.module.health_display.descrip: Shows your true health as a decimal
fireclient.module.highest_block.name: Highest Block
fireclient.module.highest_block.descript: Shows the world's highest block at your location
fireclient.module.hit_color.name: Hit Color
fireclient.module.hit_color.description: Changes the hit color of entities

fireclient.module.local_difficulty.name: Local Difficulty
fireclient.module.local_difficulty.descr: Calculates an approximation of the local difficulty calculator based on Zombie Fire Ticks
fireclient.module.mute_sounds.name: Mute Sounds
fireclient.module.mute_sounds.descriptio: Allows certain sounds to be muted
fireclient.module.nametag.name: Nametag
fireclient.module.nametag.darker_backgro: Gives nametags a darker background, making them easier to see
fireclient.module.nametag.show_own.name: Show Own
fireclient.module.nametag.text_shadow.to: Shows a text shadow for the nametag's text
fireclient.module.perspective.name: Perspective
fireclient.module.perspective.descriptio: Allows you to look around in Third Person without moving your player's head
fireclient.module.perspective.zoom.name: Zoom In/Out
fireclient.module.perspective.zoom.toolt: Zooms the Perspective in and out when using the scroll wheel
fireclient.module.render_world.name: Render World
fireclient.module.render_world.descripti: [CHEAT] Allows the toggling of the world rendering
fireclient.module.scroll_click.name: Scroll Click
fireclient.module.scroll_click.descripti: Allows you to simulate a click with every scroll
fireclient.module.scroll_click.scroll_ty: Controls whether the scroll direction changes what click is registered
fireclient.module.shadow.name: Shadows
fireclient.module.shadow.distance_effect: Entity distance to the camera affects the opacity of shadows (vanilla behavior)
fireclient.module.shadow.fullbright.name: Fullbright
fireclient.module.shadow.fullbright.tool: Makes shadow opacity not depend on light level
fireclient.module.shadow.render_on_all.t: Allows shadows to render on non-full cube blocks
fireclient.module.subtitles.name: Subtitles
fireclient.module.subtitles.visible.name: Visible
fireclient.screen.main_config.title: FireClient Main Config
fireclient.screen.main_config.tutorial: Shift to snap | Ctrl for transform | Right Click to scale
fireclient.screen.main_config.exit.name: Exit
fireclient.screen.settings.title: FireClient Options
fireclient.screen.settings.back.name: Back
fireclient.screen.settings.back.tooltip: Return to the Main Config Screen
fireclient.screen.module_select.title: Module Select
fireclient.module.toggle_toggle_sneak.de: Allows you to toggle the toggle sneak option when pressing the keybind
Fixes shields obstructing the view when riptiding with a trident
fireclient.settings.branding.name: Branding
fireclient.settings.branding.description: Optional branding message that shows in menus
fireclient.settings.prevent_untoggle_sti: Prevents untoggling sticky keys (Sprint & Sneak) when respawning
fireclient.settings.hazeli_mode.name: Hazeli Mode
fireclient.settings.dont_reset_death.des: Fixes the Death Screen buttons being reset when the window size changes
fireclient.settings.extinguish_fix.name: Fix Extinguish Sound
fireclient.settings.extinguish_fix.descr: Fixes the fire extinguish sound being spammed
Shows module outlines when they are hidden
fireclient.settings.show_tutorial_text.d: Shows the transform tutorial in the Main Config screen
fireclient.settings.prevent_hiding_entri: Prevents hiding the player list entries in the tab list
fireclient.settings.show_ping_number.des: Shows a player's latency as a number instead of bars
fireclient.settings.blaze_powder_fill.de: Prevents blaze powder from being autofilled into the fuel slot (makes it an ingredient instead)
fireclient.settings.show_modules_debug.d: Shows the module guis when the F3 debug screen is open
fireclient.settings.cache_uuid.name: Cache Entity UUID
fireclient.settings.cache_uuid.descripti: Caches the targeted entity UUID when you first open the chat screen, allowing you to use it in commands
fireclient.settings.disable_gradient.des: Disables the gradient text used in most modules in FireClient
fireclient.keybind.generic.toggle.name: Toggle
fireclient.keybind.generic.use.name: Use
